description:
1. User dapat mengedit profile channel : 
- nama channel
- channel type
- total member sama dengan jumlah member yang join channel
- who can see/remove to channel
- purpose
2. button cancel pada modal edit channel berfungsi
3. button close pada modal edit channel berfungsi
